greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n has digits in descending order and n=a+b where a has the digits of n in another order and b has the digits of n in ascending order (perhaps with leading zeros).
reference: Denis Borris, Ken Duisenberg's Puzzle of the Week, April 20, 2000
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 27 2000
